member.name: N:Microsoft.Office.Tools
member.summary: The namespace contains classes that implement smart tag and actions pane functionality in Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 Tools for the Microsoft Office System solutions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionBase
member.summary: Provides the base class for smart tag actions in Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 Tools for the Microsoft Office System solutions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionBase.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the action, as displayed in the smart tag menu.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionsPane
member.summary: The class that provides implementation for customizing the Document Actions task pane in Microsoft Office Word and Microsoft Office Excel.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CannotRemoveControlException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a control cannot be removed using the Remove method of the ControlCollection or the Delete method of the control.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ControlNameAlreadyExistsException
member.summary: This exception is thrown when the name provided for the control already exists in the worksheet or document.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.InvalidRangeException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the range supplied is not valid for the document or worksheet.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.RangeNotOnWorksheetException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the range provided does not exist on the worksheet.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.RegexCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of regular expressions to be recognized by a smart tag.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.RegexCollection.Add(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Adds a regular expression to the end of the .
member.returns: The index at which the value has been added.
member.param: The regular expression to be added to the end of the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.RegexCollection.AddRange(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[])
member.summary: Adds an array of regular expressions to the end of .
member.param: The array of regular expressions to add to the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.RegexCollection.Contains(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Determines whether the contains a specific element.
member.returns: true if the contains the specified value; otherwise, false.
member.param: The regular expression to locate in the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.RegexCollection.CopyTo(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[],System.Int32)
